text: Ko onon yo ɓen gomɗimɓe ! Wata yimɓe jalnor yimɓe : hino gasa hara ɓen (jalaaɓe) hino ɓuri ɓe moƴƴude. Wanaa rewɓe woni ko jalnorta rewɓe : hino gasa hara ɓen no ɓuri ɓe moƴƴude. Wata on aybidnir ko'e-mon, wata on bugondir jammooje (bonɗe). Innde faasiqaaku nden bonii ɓaawo nde gomɗinal nden. Kala mo tuubaali, ko ɓen woni tooñuɓe ɓen
